Question 1: What HTML tag is used to make a new image

A) img 
 B) p 
 C) h1 
 D) html
Question 2: What CSS property can be used to place a div in front of the rest of the document

A) front 
 B) height 
 C) background-image 
 D) z-index
Question 3: Which of these sort methods gives the worst time complexity

A) quick sort 
 B) merge sort 
 C) bubble sort 
 D) heap sort
Question 4: Which data structure has the best search performance time complexity

A) binary tree 
 B) array 
 C) linked list 
 D) trye
Question 5: What is the time complexity of Bubble Sort

A) O(n) 
 B) O(2n) 
 C) O(n^2) 
 D) O(log*n)
Question 6: What is the opposite of malloc()

A) collam() 
 B) free() 
 C) addMemory() 
 D) mem()
Question 7: What does it mean to have code that is DRY

A) It wasnt raining 
 B) Dont repeat yourself 
 C) computer is not wet 
 D) use best sorting algorithm
Question 8: Who is the father of computer science

A) Einstein 
 B) Newton 
 C) Turing 
 D) Jobs
Question 9: Why would you use a do while loop as opposed to a for loop

A) Code in loop executes at least once 
 B) Its easy to write 
 C) do while loops spin faster 
 D) makes code look pretty
Question 10: What does HTML stand for

A) How to meet ladies 
 B) help to make loops 
 C) help to move linux 
 D) hypertext markup language
